column4: have you looked at or do you have a /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf.old?
I have a /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf. It contains examples for basic key-based setup -- nothing about certificates, where to place them etc.
just wondering, because mine has LOTS of examples about different configs, including that stuff....
I think I saw an extensively documented wpa_supplicant.conf sample somewhere -- I'll look it up again, thanks
